name: iso
description: iso is a small self hosted bookmark and link management service. It allows saving URLs with tags and notes, searching through them and organizing reading material via a clean, keyboard friendly interface.
features: Bookmark Storage: Save URLs with titles, descriptions, and custom notes.
Tag Organization: Categorize bookmarks with flexible tagging system.
Full-Text Search: Search through bookmark titles, URLs, and notes instantly.
Keyboard Navigation: Efficient keyboard shortcuts for power users.
Reading List: Mark bookmarks as read or unread to track your reading progress.
Clean Interface: Minimal, distraction-free design focused on functionality.
Import/Export: Migrate bookmarks from browsers or other bookmark managers.
Self-Hosted: Keep your reading list and bookmarks on your own server.
